NCCP

Ontario Open
May 18-19, 2013

Saskatchewan Judoka had a good weekend in Toronto for the Ontario Open which had over 500 athletes from across Canada and USA. The Ontario Open is national team point competition and the last warm-up event prior to the national championships in Richmond, BC on July 4 to 7, 2013.

Emily Schaan and Chelys Vallejo led the way with gold medals in their weight divisions defeating their opponents with great technique and skill. All the Saskatchewan athletes fought hard and showed great spirit in their matches.

  • 1st U21 63kg Emily Schaan, Watrous
  • 1st Senior o78kg Chelys Vallejo, Prince Albert
  • 2nd U15 66kg Brandon Morrison, Lloydminster
  • 2nd U18 48kg Brette Poliakiwski, Lloydminster
  • 3rd U18 52kg Joise Lehner, Saskatoon YMCA
  • 3rd U18 57kg Sydney Poliakiwski, Lloydminster
  • 5th U15 60kg Josh Guthrie, Prince Albert
  • 5th U15 50kg Jack Karaim, Regina YMCA
  • 5th U21 & Senior 63kg Nicole Dyck, Watrous
  • 5th U18 73kg Bryce Martindale, Regina YMCA
  • 5th Senior 63kg Emily Schaan, Watrous
